title: Self-Management Strategies for Benzodiazepine Tapering

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic drug mechanisms of action and experience in chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, combining real-time video sessions with mobile-friendly assignments.

learning_goals: Learners can establish a personalized plan to reduce benzodiazepine dosage by 25% within four weeks.
Learners can identify three or more physical/psychological symptoms during medication tapering and propose coping strategies.
Learners can explain a collaborative tapering process with medical staff using the EMPOWER-ED framework.

resources: Weekly progress tracking sheet (mobile app alternative to Excel)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
